description:
VIRM are an alien hive mind species as well as invaders from outer space. Some time ago, they were once defeated and driven away by the Klaxo sapiens. Currently, the 3 known members of this race include http://anidb.net/ch93324 [Papa], http://anidb.net/ch93325 [Vice Chairman], and http://anidb.net/ch96326 [Tarsier] from http://anidb.net/ch96294 [APE].
Source: Darling in the Franxx Wiki
name: VIRM
